template.name: AllGene_Chromosome
template.title: All genes in organism --> All chromosomal locations.
template.longDescription: Show the chromosomal location and sequence for all genes from a particular organism.

query.name: AllGene_Chromosome
query.view: Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.length Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.evidence.title

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location and gene sequences for all genes from organism:

template.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
template.title: All genes in organism -> Publications.
template.longDescription: Show the publications for each gene in an organism. Data currently available for D.melanogaster.

query.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year Gene.organism.name

template.name: GeneOrganism1_OrthologueOrganism2
template.title: All genes organism1 --> Orthologues organism2.
template.longDescription: Show the predicted orthologues between two organisms.
template.comment: 13/03/07 added organismDbId to each organism. Philip

query.name: GeneOrganism1_OrthologueOrganism2
query.view: Orthologue.gene.identifier Orthologue.gene.symbol Orthologue.gene.organismDbId Orthologue.type Orthologue.orthologue.identifier Orthologue.orthologue.symbol Orthologue.orthologue.organismDbId

template.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptExon
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes, transcripts, exons.
template.longDescription: Show the genes, transcripts and exons located between two points on a chromosome. Give the location of the exons.

query.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptExon
query.view: Chromosome.identifier Chromosome.exons.gene.organismDbId Chromosome.exons.gene.symbol Chromosome.exons.gene.identifier Chromosome.exons.transcripts.identifier Chromosome.exons.identifier Chromosome.exons.objects.start Chromosome.exons.objects.end Chromosome.exons.objects.strand Chromosome.exons.evidence.title
query.constraintLogic: D and A and C and B

constraint.description: Show the genes, transcripts and exons located on chromosome:

template.name: ChromLocation_Gene
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes.
template.longDescription: Show the genes located between two points on a chromosome

query.name: ChromLocation_Gene
query.view: Chromosome.genes.identifier Chromosome.genes.symbol Chromosome.identifier Chromosome.genes.chromosomeLocation.start Chromosome.genes.chromosomeLocation.end Chromosome.genes.chromosomeLocation.strand Chromosome.genes.evidence.title
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show the genes located on chromosome:

template.name: Chromosome_Gene
template.title: Chromosome --> All genes.
template.longDescription: Show genes located on a particular chromosome.

query.name: Chromosome_Gene
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.organismDbId Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.evidence.title

template.name: Chromosome_IntergenicSequence
template.title: Chromosome --> All intergenic regions + start, end and length of intergenic regions.
template.longDescription: For a particular chromosome show start, end and length of all intergenic regions.

template.name: Gene _adjacent genes
template.title: Gene --> Adjacent genes (upstream and downstream).
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, find the upstream and the downstream adjacent genes.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

template.name: Gene_chromosomeLocation
template.title: Gene --> Chromosome location
template.longDescription: For a particular gene show its chromsomal location.

query.name: Gene_chromosomeLocation
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.organismDbId Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand

template.name: Gene_ExonLocation2
template.title: Gene --> Exons + chromosomal locations and lengths.
template.longDescription: For a specific gene, show its exons and their chromosomal locations and lengths.
template.comment: 07.02.07:re-written to work from gene identifier -Rachel. 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_ExonLocation2
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.exons.identifier Gene.exons.length Gene.exons.chromosome.identifier Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.exons.evidence.title

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location of the exons of gene:

template.name: Gene_allGOTerms
template.title: Gene --> GO terms and parents of those terms
template.longDescription: Given a gene show the associated GO terms, and the all parents to the top of the directed graph. If 'isPrimaryAssignment' is 'true' then that GO term was actually assigned to the gene. Likewise if it is false then the GO term is some more general parent term.

query.name: Gene_allGOTerms
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.allGoAnnotation.property.namespace Gene.allGoAnnotation.property.name Gene.allGoAnnotation.property.identifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.allGoAnnotation.qualifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.isPrimaryAssignment

template.name: Gene_GO
template.title: Gene --> GO terms.
template.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_GO
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.property.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.property.name Gene.goAnnotation.property.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier

template.name: Gene_Identifiers
template.title: Gene --> Identifier, organismDbID, name, symbol.
template.longDescription: Show all primary identifiers for a gene, given an identifier.
template.comment: 07:02:07:Updated to work from gene identifier - Rachel.

template.name: Gene_IntronChromosome
template.title: Gene --> Introns + chromosomal locations and lengths.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, list the introns and show the intron chromosomal locations and lengths.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

template.name: Gene_OrthologueOrganism
template.title: Gene --> Orthologues in one specific organism.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, show predicted orthologues in one particular organism. Note: both the main orthologue and secondary orthologues may be shown.
template.comment: Orthologues->subject->identifier removed for workshop (as dpse identifiers missing so made it confusing) (Rachel); 07.02.07: updated to run from gene identifier - Rachel. 13/03/07 added orthologue organismDbId. Philip 070607 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_OrthologueOrganism
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.orthologues.orthologue.identifier Gene.orthologues.orthologue.symbol Gene.orthologues.orthologue.organismDbId Gene.orthologues.orthologue.name Gene.orthologues.type

template.name: Gene_Orthologue
template.title: Gene --> Orthologues.
template.longDescription: Show predicted orthologues for a particular gene.
template.comment: 07:02:07:Updated to work from gene identifier - Rachel. 13/03/07 added orthologue organismDbId. Philip

query.name: Gene_Orthologue
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.orthologues.type Gene.orthologues.orthologue.identifier Gene.orthologues.orthologue.symbol Gene.orthologues.orthologue.organismDbId Gene.orthologues.orthologue.organism.name Gene.orthologues.evidence.title

template.name: Gene_paralogues
template.title: Gene --> Paralogues.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, show its paralogues.

template.name: Gene_pointMutationsInExons
template.title: Gene --> Point mutations overlapping exons
template.longDescription: For a particular gene show the point mutations that overlap its exons.

query.name: Gene_pointMutationsInExons
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.identifier Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.identifier Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.evidence.title

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins.
template.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

template.name: Gene_TranscriptOrthologue
template.title: Gene --> Transcript identifiers + transcript identifiers from orthologues.
template.longDescription: Show the transcript identifiers for a particular gene and the transcript identifiers of its predicted orthologues.

query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.transcripts.identifier Gene.orthologues.orthologue.identifier Gene.orthologues.orthologue.symbol Gene.orthologues.orthologue.organism.name Gene.orthologues.orthologue.transcripts.identifier Gene.orthologues.evidence.title

template.name: Gene_TranscriptExon
template.title: Gene --> Transcripts + number of exons for each transcript.
template.longDescription: Show the predicted transcripts and the number of exons for each transcript for a particular gene.

template.name: Gene_TranscriptExonLocation
template.title: Gene --> Transcripts and exons + chromosomal locations and lengths.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, list the transcripts and exons and show the chromosomal locations and lengths of the transcripts and exons.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_TranscriptExonLocation
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.transcripts.chromosome.identifier Gene.transcripts.identifier Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.transcripts.length Gene.transcripts.exons.identifier Gene.transcripts.exons.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.transcripts.exons.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.transcripts.exons.length Gene.transcripts.evidence.title

constraint.description: Show transcripts and exons for gene:

template.name: Gene_TranscriptIntronLocation
template.title: Gene --> Transcripts and introns + chromosomal locations and lengths.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, show its transcripts and introns and their chromosomal locations and lengths.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_TranscriptIntronLocation
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.transcripts.chromosome.identifier Gene.transcripts.identifier Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.transcripts.length Gene.transcripts.introns.identifier Gene.transcripts.introns.length Gene.transcripts.evidence.title

constraint.description: Show transcripts and introns for gene:

template.name: Gene_TranscriptExonIntron
template.title: Gene --> Transcripts, exons and introns.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, show all transcripts, exons and introns.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

template.name: Gene_to_upstream_intergenic
template.title: Gene --> Upstream intergenic region + chromosomal location
template.longDescription: For a particular gene show the length and chromosomal location of the upstream intergenic region.

template.name: Gene_To_Publications
template.title: Gene -> Publications
template.longDescription: Returns a list of publications that reference a selected gene

query.name: Gene_To_Publications
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.title Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year

template.name: Gene_TranscriptTranslation
template.title: Gene -> Transcripts + Translation of the transcripts.
template.longDescription: For a given gene, give all its transcripts with their respective lengths. For each transcript, give its translation with its respective length.

template.name: Gene_PointMutationLocation
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Point mutations + chromosomal locations.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, search for overlapping point mutations. Show the chromosome coordinates of any point mutations.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

template.name: Gene_transposableElementsOverlappingExons
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Transposable element insertion sites overlapping exons.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene show the transposable element insertion sites that overlap its exons.

query.name: Gene_transposableElementsOverlappingExons
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.identifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.identifier Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.identifier Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.evidence.title

template.name: Gene_Insertion
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Transposon insertions.
template.longDescription: For a particular gene, search for overlapping transposable element insertion sites.
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Insertion
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.overlappingFeatures.identifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.symbol Gene.overlappingFeatures.name Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.overlappingFeatures.evidence.title

template.name: GeneSymbol_Identifier
template.title: Gene symbol --> Gene identifier.
template.longDescription: For the following gene symbol, show its gene identifier

template.name: Gene_particularGoannotation
template.title: Gene(s) + GO term name --> Gene(s) with the GO term name
template.longDescription: For a particular gene or set of genes and a particular GO term, show which gene(s) have the GO term given.

constraint.description: show whether it/they have been annotated with the following:

template.name: GOtermidentifier_name
template.title: GO term identifier --> GO term name
template.longDescription: Give the GO term name for a particular GO term identifier.

template.name: GOname_GOidentifier
template.title: GO term name -> GO term identifier
template.longDescription: Find the GO identifier for a specific term.

template.name: GO_name_Gene
template.title: GO term name/id --> Genes in one specific organism.
template.longDescription: Search for genes in one specific organism that have been associated with a particular GO annotation. Only genes that are associated with this actual GO term will be returned. Genes which have this term as a parent of their actual GO term will not be returned.

template.name: allGO_GeneOrganism
template.title: GO term name/id [and children of this term] --> Genes in one specific organism.
template.longDescription: Find all genes that are associated with a particular GO term in a specific organism. This template will return genes that have been assigned the given GO term as well as genes that have a more specific GO term.

query.name: allGO_GeneOrganism
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.organismDbId Gene.allGoAnnotation.identifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.name Gene.allGoAnnotation.actualGoTerms.identifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.actualGoTerms.name Gene.allGoAnnotation.qualifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code

constraint.description: that have the following GO term:

template.name: A_IdentifierSynonym_Object
template.title: Identifier or synonym --> Database object.
template.longDescription: Find an entry in the database using any identifier or synonym.
template.comment: This is the template that the quick search runs. If the name is changed it also has to be changed for the quick search configuration - Rachel. Removed tags so no longer displayed - just used for quick search now. Rachel.

template.name: Organism_GoTerm_Gene
template.title: Organism + GO term --> Genes
template.longDescription: Show genes from a particular organism annotated with a particular GO term.

template.name: Organism_GoTermEC_Gene
template.title: Organism + GO term [with particular evidence code] --> Genes
template.longDescription: Show genes from a particular organism annotated with a particular GO term with a particular evidence code.

query.name: Organism_GoTermEC_Gene
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.name Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier

template.name: Organism_GoTerm_GeneWithannotation
template.title: Organism + GO term [with particular evidence code] --> Genes + 'with' annotation.
template.longDescription: Show genes from a particular organism annotated with a particular GO term and GO evidence code which also have a 'with' annotation (The 'with' field holds an additional identifier for annotations using certain evidence codes)

query.name: Organism_GoTerm_GeneWithannotation
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.name Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.goAnnotation.with.identifier

constraint.description: Show genes and 'with' annotations from organism:

template.name: OrganismGoterm_genesPointMutations

template.longDescription: Show all genes from a particular organism that have been annotated with a particular Go term(s) and the point mutations which overlap these genes.

query.name: OrganismGoterm_genesPointMutations

constraint.description: Show genes and overlapping point mutations from:

template.name: OrganismGOterm_GenesTEinsertionsite

query.name: OrganismGOterm_GenesTEinsertionsite
query.view: Gene.identifier Gene.organismDbId Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.name Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.symbol Gene.overlappingFeatures.evidence.title

pathDescription.description: Transposable element insertion site > data set
